{"blocks":[{"key":"eirfh","text":"After autoclaving, gentle swirl the bottle to ensure the agarose is fully dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ps26","text":"For agarose pads (Step 8, below), only   medium is required per session, thus, it is best to aliquot the media at this stage to avoid repeated solidification/melting cycles of the medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4b6qf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"51002D80CC3211EC827AED3ACB313BA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46fnl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bf9o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8bbsi","text":"Pads can be used on the same day, but you may get ‘drift’ when imaging due to the continued setting of the agarose.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4svto","text":"When required for use with microbial cultures, the top cover slip on an agarose pad should be removed from the selected pad. The pad can then be cut into smaller pieces (if required) or the whole pad placed into a 60mm dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bj66","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a3fjr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1j06j","text":"You can use the top coverslip to help release the pad from the bottom coverslip and slide it into the petri dish.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7v84a","text":"Add bacteria culture and start imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
